message: Congratulations! You're one of the first to see our new product! We're excited to offer it to you at a special price of $10000. As a valued customer, we're willing to share with you that our overall sales rate is 80% high-quality products. Would you like to take advantage of this unique opportunity and make a smart investment?

I'll take the chance since the probability of getting a high-quality product is 80% and the potential gain is $10000. I understand that I'm the first buyer and there's no sales record to rely on, but I trust the provided probability.
